document.full_text: a drone digging machine arrived on sunday at a silver mine in idaho where a lone worker has been trapped by a cave-in more than a mile underground with no outside contact since late friday.
document.title: remote digging machine sent to help trapped idaho miner
lines_and_colors: a drone digging machine arrived on sunday at a silver mine in idaho where a lone worker has been trapped by a cave-in more than a mile underground with no outside contact since late friday.
